page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: Everyone enjoys wearing fasionable clothes.Pastel colours ar fasionable so are big,bold flowers.Tight skirts or ski-pants are worn with baggy trousers with zips and gathered bottoms known as 'Mr.Zippys'.A bob is a fasionable hairstyle,the hair is cut short.Our favourite groups are Duran Duran,Michael Jackson and Wham.Wham appeared on Live Aid at Wembley recently to raise money for famine relief in Ethiopia.Most of us get between 50p and Â£1 a week to spend on sweets,tapes and toys.We nearly all buy comics our favourites are;Look-in, Girl,Match and Beano. Many of us have got videos at home,some of us have got computers which we use for learning and playing games.The most popular type of bike is BMX every body in our school has a bike.Every body in school enjoys watching television every night
